dct_title_s: Regni Davidici et Salomonæi descriptio geographica cum vicinis regionibus Syriæ et Ægypti
dct_description_sm: concinnata a Joh. Matthia Hasio Math. P., pappa principalis. Schema III ; Prostat Noriberga in Officina Homamana.
Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
7 bar scales on map given in "Stadia graeca", "Stadia recentiora", "Stadia aegypt.", "Milliaria romana", "Milliaria germanica", "Leucae gallicce minores", and "Leucae gallicce majores".
Shows topography, drainage, boundaries, travel routes, places of historical interest.
Appears in Haas' Atlas historicus. Nuernberg : Homann's Heirs, 1750.
